name.cs: ScoreCheck - Živé výsledky a tabulky NHL
name.es: ScoreCheck - Resultados y clasificaciones de la NHL en vivo
name.fr: ScoreCheck - Résultats et classements en direct de la LNH
name.ru: ScoreCheck - Текущие результаты НХЛ и турнирная таблица

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: ScoreCheck provides users with live score and standings data from the NHL
short.cs: ScoreCheck poskytuje uživatelům živé výsledky a tabulková data z celé NHL
short.de: ScoreCheck bietet Benutzern Live-Ergebnisse und Tabellendaten aus der gesamten NHL
short.es: ScoreCheck proporciona a los usuarios resultados en vivo y datos de tablas de toda la NHL
short.fi: ScoreCheck tarjoaa käyttäjille reaaliaikaisia NHL-pisteitä ja -sijoituksia
short.fr: ScoreCheck fournit aux utilisateurs les scores en direct de la LNH et les données de classement
short.ru: ScoreCheck предоставляет пользователям текущий счет и турнирную таблицу НХЛ.
short.sv: ScoreCheck ger användarna liveresultat och ställningsdata från NHL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Stay up to date with live scores and standings from the National Hockey League with just one click!

Updates:
Version 1.0
- Added wild card view of standings
- Added scores yesterday and tomorrow's scores
- Added special styling for playoff and preseason games
- Fix small bug with OTL view in standings

Version 1.1
- Added loading screen

Version 1.2
- Added more language support

Version 2.0
- Added ability to view the entire season calendar
- Added ability to filter games by team

Verison 2.1
- Fixed bug where delayed and postponed games displayed as "undefined"
- Updated translations for Filters page and dates

Version 2.2
- Added standings to the scoreboard screen

Version 3.0
- Increased reliability

Version 3.0.4
- Replaced Arizona Coyotes (RIP) with Utah
long.cs,de,es,fi,fr,ru,sv:
Stay up to date with live scores and standings from the National Hockey League with just one click!

Updates:
Version 1.0
- Added wild card view of standings
- Added scores yesterday and tomorrow's scores
- Added special styling for playoff and preseason games
- Fix small bug with OTL view in standings

Version 1.1
- Added loading screen

Version 1.2
- Added support for Spanish, French, German, Russian, Czech, Swedish, and Finnish
